comment.author: 26220432@N06
comment._content:
** translation of describtion **

Second World War, landwar Eastern Front. German shocktroops with machine guns and spy-glasses positioned themselves behind a farmhouse. Russia/Soviet Union, 1941

comment.author: 78705066@N00
comment._content: Waffen SS troops in camouflage clothing ( at this time only used by these troops ). Light machine gun MG 34 on anti-aircraft tripod. The other squad members are armed with rifles K98.

comment.author: 99071700@N00
comment._content:
These photos are mesmerizing somehow.

Litteronly, it's not just your country, it's the whole of the human race. We are all as capable of beauty and kindness as we are at destruction and hatefulness.

comment.author: 27223070@N04
comment._content:
litteronly,  i agree its the human race and sadly not too much has changed.
For most individual soldiers in battle, it ultimately boils down to obey, fight. kill or be...

turkveil, is the insignia on non-camouflage helmet also a clue?

while viewing these photos i imagine the sounds, emoting and even the smells at the moment these were taken.

comment.author: 78705066@N00
comment._content:
@val1009: can´t recognize the insignia on the helmet on this picture, it is to small. As mentioned, only the Waffen-SS units used camouflage clothing at the early stage of the war. The Wehrmacht had own camouflage suits with a different pattern later in the war and some Luftwaffe field divisions adopted the SS camouflage pattern later also.
The Waffen-SS factually was the first big unit in the war and in the world, which used camouflage clothing on a broad basic - today most field uniforms show a certain camouflage pattern.

comment.author: 26195992@N02
comment._content:
Amazing photograph.
It is incredible what these war-time photographers must have seen.
The amazing ingeneuity, the powerful determination and the terrifying horror that all humans are capable of.
It always amazes me how much photos return the perspective to the individuals being photographed: fathers, brothers and sons of both sides.
